com.absio.broker.mapper

Class SecuredContainerMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.broker.mapper.AbstractMapper
      • com.absio.broker.mapper.SecuredContainerMapper

  • public class SecuredContainerMapper
extends AbstractMapper
    This maps all secured container data to/from the Absio Broker™ application. All create, read, update and delete operations relating to SecuredContainer are handled by the mapper. No logic for encrypting or decrypting exists in the mapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecuredContainerMapper(Session session)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createOrUpdate(SecuredContainer container)
      Uploads the encrypted content of the SecuredContainer and the Metadata to the Absio Broker™ application.
      void delete(UUID containerId)
      Deletes the encrypted content of the container and deletes the metadata records from the Absio Broker™ application application.
      SecuredContainer get(UUID containerId)
      Returns the SecuredContainer from the Absio Broker™ application.
      ContainerInfo getInfo(UUID containerId)
      Gets the ContainerInfo for a SecuredContainer from the Absio Broker™ application.
      void updateAccess(UUID containerId, List<Access> accessLevels)
      Updates the access for a SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application.
      void updateType(UUID containerId, String type)
      Update the type of a SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecuredContainerMapper

        public SecuredContainerMapper(Session session)
                       throws NoSuchPaddingException,
                              NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session for the mapper
        Throws:
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the default padding for symmetric encryption is not supported
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if ECDH is not supported

    • Method Detail

      • createOrUpdate

        public void createOrUpdate(SecuredContainer container)
                    throws IOException,
                           InterruptedException,
                           BrokerException
        Uploads the encrypted content of the SecuredContainer and the Metadata to the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        container - the SecuredContainer to create or update
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues

      • delete

        public void delete(UUID containerId)
            throws InterruptedException,
                   BrokerException,
                   IOException
        Deletes the encrypted content of the container and deletes the metadata records from the Absio Broker™ application application.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the container to delete
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues

      • get

        public SecuredContainer get(UUID containerId)
                     throws InterruptedException,
                            BrokerException,
                            IOException
        Returns the SecuredContainer from the Absio Broker™ application. This will have the encrypted data as well as the metadata from the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the container to get
        Returns:
        the SecuredContainer
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues

      • getInfo

        public ContainerInfo getInfo(UUID containerId)
                      throws InterruptedException,
                             BrokerException,
                             IOException
        Gets the ContainerInfo for a SecuredContainer from the Absio Broker™ application. This is the Metadata, Access list and download URL information for the container.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the container to get
        Returns:
        the ContainerInfo
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues

      • updateAccess

        public void updateAccess(UUID containerId,
                         List<Access> accessLevels)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException,
                         BrokerException
        Updates the access for a SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the SecuredContainer to update access for
        accessLevels - the new access list for the SecuredContainer
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues

      • updateType

        public void updateType(UUID containerId,
                       String type)
                throws IOException,
                       InterruptedException,
                       BrokerException
        Update the type of a SecuredContainer on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the SecuredContainer to update the type for
        type - the new type value for the SecuredContainer
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
